uvi.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v4.19.195
uvi.description:
NFS: Fix use-after-free in nfs4_init_client()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.195 by commit 42c10b0db064e45f5c5ae7019bbf2168ffab766c, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 8dcbec6d20eb881ba368d0aebc3a8a678aebb1da. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
